00001 package ScheatorController;
00002 
00003 import ScheatorView.*;
00004 import java.util.EventListener;
00005 import java.util.ArrayList;
00006 import javax.swing.event.*;
00007 import javax.swing.table.*;
00008 import javax.swing.AbstractListModel;
00009 import java.awt.event.*;
00010 import java.awt.*;
00011 
00019 public abstract class AbstractController implements EventListener {
00020 
00021     //  Vectors that hold a list of the registered models and views for this controller.
00022 
00023     ArrayList<AbstractView> registeredViews;
00024     MainView mainFrame;
00025     ArrayList<Object> registeredModels;
00026 
00027 
00029     public AbstractController() {
00030         registeredViews = new ArrayList<AbstractView>();
00031         registeredModels = new ArrayList<Object>();
00032     }
00033 
00041     public void addModel(Object model) {
00042         registeredModels.add(model);
00043         if(model instanceof AbstractTableModel) {
00044             AbstractTableModel T = (AbstractTableModel) model;
00045             T.addTableModelListener(new TableModelListenerImpl());
00046         }
00047         if (model instanceof AbstractListModel) {
00048             AbstractListModel T = (AbstractListModel) model;
00049             T.addListDataListener(new ListDataListenerImpl());
00050         }
00051         if (model instanceof ItemSelectable) {
00052             ItemSelectable T = (ItemSelectable) model;
00053             T.addItemListener(new ItemListenerImpl());
00054         }
00055     }
00056 
00061     public void removeModel(Object model) {
00062         registeredModels.remove(model);
00063         if(model instanceof AbstractTableModel) {
00064             AbstractTableModel T = (AbstractTableModel) model;
00065             T.removeTableModelListener(new TableModelListenerImpl());
00066         }
00067         if (model instanceof AbstractListModel) {
00068             AbstractListModel T = (AbstractListModel) model;
00069             T.removeListDataListener(new ListDataListenerImpl());
00070         }    
00071         if (model instanceof ItemSelectable) {
00072             System.err.println("Item is selectable");
00073             ItemSelectable T = (ItemSelectable) model;
00074             T.addItemListener(new ItemListenerImpl());
00075         }
00076     }
00077 
00078 
00084     public void addView(AbstractView view) {
00085         registeredViews.add(view);
00086     }
00087 
00092     public void removeView(AbstractView view) {
00093         registeredViews.remove(view);
00094     }
00095 
00096     public void addMainFrame(MainView frame) {
00097         this.mainFrame = frame;
00098     }
00099 
00100     class TableModelListenerImpl implements TableModelListener {
00101         public void tableChanged(TableModelEvent e) {
00102             for (AbstractView view: registeredViews) {
00103                 view.mainTableChanged(e);
00104             }
00105             mainFrame.mainTableChanged(e);
00106         }
00107     }
00108 
00109     class ListDataListenerImpl implements ListDataListener {
00110         public void contentsChanged(ListDataEvent e) {
00111             for (AbstractView view: registeredViews) {
00112                 view.comboBoxEvent(e);
00113             }
00114             System.err.println("contentsChanged()");
00115             mainFrame.comboBoxEvent(e);
00116         }
00117 
00118         public void intervalRemoved(ListDataEvent e) {
00119             for (AbstractView view: registeredViews) {
00120                 view.comboBoxEvent(e);
00121             }
00122             mainFrame.comboBoxEvent(e);
00123         }
00124 
00125         public void intervalAdded(ListDataEvent e) {
00126             for (AbstractView view: registeredViews) {
00127                 view.comboBoxEvent(e);
00128             }
00129             mainFrame.comboBoxEvent(e);
00130         }
00131 
00132     }
00133 
00134 
00135 
00136     class ItemListenerImpl implements ItemListener {
00137         public void itemStateChanged(ItemEvent e) {
00138             for (AbstractView view: registeredViews) {
00139                 view.itemStateChanged(e);
00140             }
00141             System.err.println("itemStateChanged");
00142             mainFrame.itemStateChanged(e);
00143         }
00144     }
00145 }
